issue.title: DAZN Dynamic Ad Insertion
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version Default DoH ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? dazn.com ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I am mainly concerned about the Adguard public DNS viability of blocking the domain dai.google.com DAZN sports streaming service uses dynamic ad insertion in their broadcasts, therefore inserting personalized ads, not only on web browsers, but also on Smart TV devices where the only way to block ads would be using DNS blocking. During commercial breaks, requests to the domain in question can be evidenced. Manually blocking requests to said domain does not break the video stream, it only makes it so ad breaks do not have personalized ads. Therefore adding this domain to the blocklist would allow users of DAZN service to enjoy their streams without personalized ads inserted during breaks, and instead allow us to watch the original broadcast ads. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
